author: m.kalinin
content: I have a question on Test Cases section of 3675 (The Merge EIP). What do ppl think we should put in there? I've seen some EIPs with a kind of test plan in this section -- this might work for the Merge (or a link to test plan). Asking because there are test cases gonna be implemented in retesteth, also test cases convering this EIP are in progress in Hive.
